definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Li Zhe, personal name of fourth Tang Emperor Zhongzong 唐中宗[Tang2 Zhong1 zong1] (656-710), reigned 705-710
Yuan T. Lee (1936-), Taiwanese-born Chemist and Nobel Prize winner in 1986
Terence Tao, Chinese-Australian mathematician, Fields medalist in 2006
a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom)/to put one's own safety before matters of principle
Hezhen ethnic group of Heilongjiang province
a wise man has passed away (idiom)
Ko Wen-je (1959-), Taiwanese independent politician, Mayor of Taipei City from 2014

sentences.english: Old Major cleared his throat and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 老麥哲清了清嗓子開始唱歌。

sentences.english: The woman is thirty years old, this is the most attractive rose, the age of maturity and charming.
sentences.chinese: 女忍叄拾歲湜玫瑰，哲湜最猶魅力得年齡，成熟迷忍。

sentences.english: In other words, Jekyll was unable to control his dark side.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，哲基爾無法控制他邪惡的一面。

sentences.english: Only videos related to ThomasJack are allowed.
sentences.chinese: 只允許有關東於哲的影音。

sentences.english: Dreamseed - Gain harmonic attunement with the low vibrational sounds of the didgeridoo .
sentences.chinese: 以底哲裏度的低顫音頻讓您獲得和諧的平衡。

sentences.english: ISBN bold black and white skin with philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 書本的黑體字染黑白哲的皮膚。
這是的海林哲的舊辦公室。

sentences.english: Watching Wen in her sleep, Zhe stays wide awake that night.
sentences.chinese: 看着紋熟睡的臉，哲一夜未眠。

sentences.english: This duck's web is delicious; it tastes like the jelly-fish we had yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 這鴨掌很好喫，味道很像我們昨天喫的海哲。

sentences.english: The sages tell us that the torah is Gd's infinite knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 哲人們告訴我們，托拉是上帝無限的智慧。

sentences.english: Holzer algorithm has clear physical concept and simple operation.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾哲算法物理概念清楚，運算簡便。

sentences.english: Zhe is taken away from Wen forever.

definition: edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
